@nancyme12345 how do u make torrents at transmission go fast? thx!

That's retarded. PLEASE understand, that there's no real way to 'make your torrents download faster'. Learn how torrents work please. 

More upload, gives you more download speed. That's how torrents function. You can't just click a button to make your downloads go faster, or else what's the point of even having an option like that?It all depends on the seeder/leecher relationship, and how fast your internet speed is. It has ABSOLUTELY NOTHING to do with your torrenting software/additional options. And the most tinkering you can do gives you maybe 5-10 kbps difference.
Awesome! Works great! Thanks a LOT.

@1reuben1 just let it keep playing when it says abort the messege will change and it'll configure the settings according to your computers setup.

This game works perfectly on my Mac OSX 10.6.7, 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo, 4GB 667 MHz.

(1680 x 1050 res, bench players off, no AA, everything else set to high)
MacBook Pro 15.4", dual-core i7 @ 2.66GHz, 8GB RAM, Momentus XT 500GB, mid-2010)

A couple of freezes in 2 months is perfectly acceptable for a wine ported game. Save a lot a trouble installing fucking Windows on my machine.
